items.text: back of a length, spinning away, punched off the backfoot
full, middle and leg, defended
spins away from a length, gets forward and defends
short of length outside off, opens the face to point
items.shortText: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Sai: "@Akshay, Isn't Rovman's thinking needs an appreciation? I would say, fantastic Captaincy to bring in Oshane now and test the new pair. Holding himself off after an 8 run over & bringing in Thomas. Would've expected to give him another wicket and he certainly delivered it! "
items.text: short, wide, cut to deep backward point
items.shortText: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: short, climbs on him outside off as he arches away
short of good length, holds its line and rips past the outside edge
short of length, opens the face to third man
short ball down the leg side
items.shortText: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 wide

items.text: full, angled across off, slapped down to long-off
items.shortText: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: length, straightens on middle, backs away and cuts to deep cover
full, middle and leg, defended
short of length outside off, backs away and slaps through point
full, middle and leg, nudged into the on side
shifts back and whips against the turn to deep midwicket
items.postText: Putting Saurabh back in the hot seat.

items.preText: thanks Akshay. Change in bowling too, Roach coming on
items.text: inside edge runs down to fine leg for four stuck his bat out outside off, very casual shot. the ball was not full enough to drive, takes the edge, misses the stumps. The bowler's got his hands on his head
fuller on off, much more careful in defence that time, with bat close to pad. Pushes the ball to cover
slower ball, jagging back in from outside off. He waits for it and steers it to backward point
digs it in short, on middle stump, but Shakib is in control of the shot, pulling it down to deep square leg
items.shortText: Roach to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, moving back into the batsman who stays back and works it to midwicket
back of a length, angling into the batsman from around the stumps. Defended back. And it's time for drinks
items.shortText: Roach to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText:
For all those asking about Liton Das: The commentators just said there is a chance he could come back to bat.

Kamani: "Im from the Caribbean.. Its 5 am .. A lot has critiqued Powell in being interim captain. But I must say that he's doing a good job and must be commended" - he's certainly got his bowling changes spot on, and managed to pull Bangladesh back when Mushfiqur-Tamim were looking like running away with it.

zaman: "I think 250 run on the board will be enough to defend." - might well be. West Indies batting has been very fragile
items.text: tossed up on middle and off, turning away. Stays in his crease and punches to cover
flatter on middle, doesn't turn as much. Slapped to cover
that looked slightly quicker, he was hurried into the shot, didn't connect well with the intended cut.
